name: Microsoft Teams
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Teams 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Teams API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: channel
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
Channel Message (值: channelMessage)
Chat Message (值: chatMessage)
Task (值: task)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a task
Delete (值: deleteTask) - Delete a task
Get (值: get) - Get a task
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many tasks
Update (值: update) - Update a task

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Select the team from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "groupId" parameter in the URL you get from "Get a link to the team")
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team | 作用: Select the team from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "groupId" parameter in the URL you get from "Get a link to the team") | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the channel

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignedTo (值: None) - Who the task should be assigned to
dueDateTime (值: None) - Date and time at which the task is due. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.
percentComplete (值: None) - Percentage of task completion. When set to 100, the task is considered completed.

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Select the channel from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "threadId" in the URL)
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: Select the channel from the list, by URL, or by ID (the ID is the "threadId" in the URL) | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

contentType.name: contentType
contentType.description: Whether the message is plain text or HTML
contentType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content Type | 作用: Whether the message is plain text or HTML | 默认值: text | (必填项)
available_options: Text (值: text)
HTML (值: html)

chatId.name: chatId
chatId.description: Select the chat from the list, by URL, or by ID (find the chat ID after "conversations/" in the URL)
chatId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat | 作用: Select the chat from the list, by URL, or by ID (find the chat ID after "conversations/" in the URL) | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: The ID of the message to retrieve
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: The ID of the message to retrieve | (必填项)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields
available_options: Using Fields Below (值: fields)
Using JSON (值: json)

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

planId.name: planId
planId.description: The plan for the task to belong to
planId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Plan | 作用: The plan for the task to belong to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

bucketId.name: bucketId
bucketId.description: The bucket for the task to belong to
bucketId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bucket | 作用: The bucket for the task to belong to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Title of the task | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: The ID of the task to update
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: The ID of the task to update | (必填项)

tasksFor.name: tasksFor
tasksFor.description: Whether to retrieve the tasks for a user or for a plan
tasksFor.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tasks For | 作用: Whether to retrieve the tasks for a user or for a plan | 默认值: member | (必填项)
available_options: Group Member (值: member) - Tasks assigned to group member
Plan (值: plan) - Tasks in group plan

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignedTo (值: None) - Who the task should be assigned to
bucketId (值: None) - The bucket for the task to belong to
dueDateTime (值: None) - Date and time at which the task is due. The Timestamp type represents date and time information using ISO 8601 format and is always in UTC time.
groupId (值: None)
percentComplete (值: None) - Percentage of task completion. When set to 100, the task is considered completed.
planId (值: None) - The plan for the task to belong to
title (值: None) - Title of the task
